BankStatementAnalyzer - Class in project.banking
Ð•he class is an entity with the function of processing the list of bank transactions.
BankStatementAnalyzer() - Constructor for class project.banking.BankStatementAnalyzer
 
BankStatementCSVParser - Class in project.banking
Class is a realisation of 'BankStatementParser' which is designed for parsing '.csv' files.
BankStatementCSVParser() - Constructor for class project.banking.BankStatementCSVParser
 
BankStatementParser - Interface in project.banking
Implementation of the interface give an opportunity for converting 'String'
line to 'BankTransaction' representation.
BankStatementProcessor - Class in project.banking
Possible functions: 1) create Summary Statics ( max, min, sum, avg); 2) calculate transactions in exact Month; 3) calculate number of transactions; 4) filter transactions according to some condition; Class follows up single responsibility principle: class responsibility is "processing";
BankStatementProcessor(List<BankTransaction>) - Constructor for class project.banking.BankStatementProcessor
Class constructor.
BankTransaction - Class in project.banking
Class is a data transfer object (DTO).
BankTransaction(LocalDate, double, String) - Constructor for class project.banking.BankTransaction
Class constructor.
BankTransactionFilter - Interface in project.banking
Interface giving an opportunity to sort 'Bank transactions' list according to some condition.
BankTransactionSummarizer - Interface in project.banking
The interface is designed to implement the concept of sequential enumeration of all banking transactions.
